name: Drink' Em Up!
description:
Thou art DRUNK! Go HOME! But be sure to keep away from scarecrows! And beers!

Move: A, S, D, W or the arrows; Attack: E

Game developed during Ludum Dare 39 in 48 hours by Francisco Anderson, Iago Lobo & Thiago André.

Ludum Dare 39 game page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/drink-em-up
